ABOUT__INTRODUCE: Focused on creating visually engaging and finely interactive web experiences. Transitioned from full-stack to frontend development, bringing over 6 years of software development experience. Skilled at blending animation with user experience to deliver high-quality work that balances technology and aesthetics.
SKILLS__DESCRIPTION: Proficient in the Vue.js ecosystem with experience in SSR development using Nuxt.js. Continuously learning front-end technologies such as React.js. Skilled in animation libraries like GSAP and capable with design tools (Figma, Photoshop, Illustrator). Strong full-stack background with experience in PHP, Java, and C#, and hands-on exploration of blockchain by writing and deploying Solidity smart contracts. Experienced in iOS app development and publication, and have built various side projects including Chrome Extensions, LINE LIFF, and Electron.js apps.
EXPERIENCE__DESCRIPTION: Over 6 years of software development experience, starting as a full-stack developer and gradually focusing on frontend engineering. Skilled in system architecture, cross-functional collaboration, and the Vue.js ecosystem. Participated in large-scale enterprise system maintenance as well as leading end-to-end product development in startup teams. Experienced in both remote and on-site workflows with flexible adaptability to different team environments and requirements.
EXPERIENCE__1__PROJECT_1: Developed marketing campaign sites, pre-registration pages, and high-interaction in-game web events for several well-known mobile games (e.g., Arena of Valor, Moonlight Blade M, Black Clover M) using Nuxt.js and Vue.js. Also responsible for frontend development and maintenance of internal admin systems.
EXPERIENCE__1__PROJECT_2: Optimized web performance, implemented responsive design, ensured In-App WebView compatibility, integrated SEO strategies, and maintained cross-device support.
EXPERIENCE__1__PROJECT_3: Collaborated closely with UI/UX designers, backend developers, QA, and PMs—handled everything from API integration to cross-functional technical planning to ensure on-time project delivery.
EXPERIENCE__1__PROJECT_4: Managed exception handling and error monitoring in high-traffic environments using Sentry to quickly respond to issues and deploy fixes.
EXPERIENCE__1__PROJECT_5: Enhanced overall code quality and maintainability through active participation in code reviews, development of shared UI components (via Storybook), and creation of internal documentation and Cookiecutter-based project templates.
EXPERIENCE__1__PROJECT_6: Contributed to team knowledge-sharing through internal frontend tech talks, book study sessions, and experimentation with new tools. Also participated in external tech community events, such as the {Laravel x Vue} Conf Taiwan 2023.
EXPERIENCE__2__PROJECT_1: Developed both frontend and partial backend features for various projects using Nuxt.js, Vue.js, and Laravel (PHP), including e-commerce platforms, blockchain trading systems, smart vending machines, and internal admin tools.
EXPERIENCE__2__PROJECT_2: Researched and built blockchain applications, wrote Ethereum smart contracts (Solidity), developed trading APIs, and integrated Web3.js with crypto wallet functionality.
EXPERIENCE__2__PROJECT_3: Collaborated with backend engineers and QA, and implemented UI based on Zeplin and Sketch design specs, adjusting RWD and UX flows according to business requirements.
EXPERIENCE__2__PROJECT_4: Integrated third-party payment APIs, set up Google Analytics and conversion tracking, and implemented backend event tracking logic.
EXPERIENCE__2__PROJECT_5: Involved in technical planning from scratch, participated in cross-functional discussions, and contributed to long-term maintenance and feature optimization.
EXPERIENCE__3__PROJECT_1: Independently managed freelance projects from end to end, including client negotiation, requirements gathering, project planning, scheduling, delivery, and closure.
EXPERIENCE__3__PROJECT_2: Developed customized admin systems, handling frontend UI and feature implementation tailored to client workflows.
EXPERIENCE__3__PROJECT_3: Modified and optimized Google Blogger templates based on client needs, improving layout structure and functional logic.
EXPERIENCE__3__PROJECT_4: Responsible for responsive web design and frontend development to ensure a consistent user experience across devices.
EXPERIENCE__3__PROJECT_5: Collaborated with backend engineers to integrate APIs and implement dynamic data presentation and interaction.
EXPERIENCE__4__PROJECT_1: Developed ERP systems, long-term care platforms, and medical device companion apps, covering both enterprise and healthcare field applications.
EXPERIENCE__4__PROJECT_2: Responsible for full-stack development, including database schema design, backend API development, and frontend implementation.
EXPERIENCE__4__PROJECT_3: Built responsive web interfaces to ensure a seamless experience across different devices and screen sizes.
EXPERIENCE__4__PROJECT_4: Led technical planning from the ground up, participated in cross-departmental coordination, and continued maintaining and optimizing system functionality.
EXPERIENCE__4__PROJECT_5: Engaged directly with frontline clients to gather requirements and translate real-world needs into viable technical solutions.
EXPERIENCE__5__PROJECT_1: Developed internal tools, a financial backend system, and a meal ordering platform to support daily operations and improve workflow efficiency.
EXPERIENCE__5__PROJECT_2: Implemented and maintained backend modules based on requirements specified by SA/SD via work orders.
EXPERIENCE__5__PROJECT_3: Built and integrated backend APIs, handling data processing logic and flow implementation.
EXPERIENCE__5__PROJECT_4: Responsible for frontend UI layout and API integration to enable interactive data functionality.
EXPERIENCE__6__PROJECT_1: Completed a variety of computer science and business-related courses during university, building a strong foundation in programming and logical thinking.
EXPERIENCE__6__PROJECT_2: Core coursework included: Programming, Database Design, Statistics, Discrete Mathematics, Accounting, Information Management, and Calculus.
WORKS__DESCRIPTION: Besides professional development roles, I am passionate about exploring new technologies and transforming real-life pain points into side projects. With backend experience, I can independently complete full-stack development, from UI/UX design to functional implementation, creating projects with technical depth and a great user experience. I have a strong interest in design and visual aesthetics; although not a professional designer, I pay close attention to details and overall visual harmony, aiming to strike the best balance between user experience and visual effects.
WORKS__PROJECTS__DESCRIPTION_25101: Worked at Garena Singapore from 2022 to 2025, responsible for developing and maintaining multilingual marketing websites for multiple games. Projects covered main game visuals, pre-registration events, announcements, social sharing, and incorporated interactive visual effects to enhance player engagement. Participated in all stages from requirements discussion, front-end and back-end integration, UI implementation to subsequent maintenance and updates, helping create a website experience with strong brand identity and marketing impact.

WORKS__PROJECTS__NAME_22102: Tracke (區塊鏈收藏品交易平台)
WORKS__PROJECTS__DESCRIPTION_22102: 2019 至 2022 年於紫洣科技股份有限公司任職，負責該公司開發的區塊鏈交易平台的前端開發、部分後端 API 撰寫與後台系統開發。參與區塊鏈以太坊智能合約的開發與交易互動撰寫，並開發支持競價拍賣交易、商品展示、商品分類等多種功能。處理競拍同步問題與交易衝突，確保競拍得標並提升整體交易體驗。
WORKS__PROJECTS__SKILLS_22102_1: 進行前端 RWD 開發，支援多裝置顯示需求，確保一致的用戶體驗
WORKS__PROJECTS__SKILLS_22102_2: 開發多語言網站系統，支援國際化與本地化
WORKS__PROJECTS__SKILLS_22102_3: 負責 API 串接與後續維護，並根據需求開發新功能與改版
WORKS__PROJECTS__SKILLS_22102_4: 與後端工程師協作，撰寫 API 並進行資料庫規劃，確保系統的穩定性與可擴展性
WORKS__PROJECTS__SKILLS_22102_5: 負責後台系統的全端開發，提供完整的管理與運營支持
WORKS__PROJECTS__SKILLS_22102_6: 串接第三方區塊鏈錢包，實現與區塊鏈的無縫互動
WORKS__PROJECTS__SKILLS_22102_7: 開發以太坊智能合約並撰寫 Solidity 合約與交易互動 API，支持區塊鏈交易功能
WORKS__PROJECTS__SKILLS_22102_8: 與設計師合作，根據 Sketch 和 Zeplin 設計稿進行前端開發，確保 UI/UX 的優化
WORKS__PROJECTS__SKILLS_22102_9: 參與團隊會議，與 PM 討論技術可行性並規劃開發時程，確保專案順利進行
WORKS__PROJECTS__SKILLS_22102_10: 解決競拍同步問題，處理交易衝突並確保競拍得標，提升交易流程的穩定性
WORKS__PROJECTS__DESCRIPTION_25203:
復刻小時候摺疊2G手機的小遊戲，獨自規劃全端開發、資料庫規劃，利用美術素材包來製作像素風格的小遊戲，並利用 Matter.js 來實踐真實世界的物理堆疊和重力。

WORKS__PROJECTS__DESCRIPTION_20201: 開發了一款簡單易用的旅遊行程規劃工具，旨在幫助用戶安排旅行計劃。該工具支持多款客製化功能，例如自定義 icon 顯示，並可通過拖放操作輕鬆調整行程順序，無限擴展行程天數。此專案的開發源自個人的痛點，致力於提升用戶在規劃行程過程中的便捷性與靈活性。
WORKS__PROJECTS__SKILLS_20201_1: 從零開始規劃並開發整個專案，涵蓋 UI/UX 設計及前端實現，根據自身需求與痛點開發專案功能

WORKS__PROJECTS__SKILLS_20201_3: 特別利用 contextmenu、drag、drop 事件來實作拖放與右鍵菜單等自定義操作，提升使用體驗

WORKS__PROJECTS__DESCRIPTION_220201: 開發了一個網頁串流視訊和音訊的專案，使用 navigator.mediaDevices 進行視訊與音訊的串流功能實現，並加入了聊天互動介面。此專案旨在提供一個即時通訊和視訊通話的簡易平台，並透過 GSAP 動畫增強用戶的互動體驗，讓整體操作更加流暢與生動。
WORKS__PROJECTS__SKILLS_220201_: 使用 Vue.js 框架進行前端開發，構建動態且高效的用戶界面

WORKS__PROJECTS__SKILLS_220201_3: 進行響應式 RWD 網頁開發，確保在各種裝置上提供一致的用戶體驗

WORKS__PROJECTS__NAME_210203: 全台公車動態時刻查詢應用服務（比賽作品）
WORKS__PROJECTS__DESCRIPTION_210203:
整合全台公車及客運的動態時刻資訊，提供用戶查詢各站點的即時公車及客運運行狀態，並於地圖上顯示各站點的動態站牌。
[比賽時間內未完全挑戰成功，功能尚未完整實現]
